TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISecureStore

Docs.summary: Provides an interface to manage target applications and credentials stored in the Secure Store.

Docs.summary: Creates a target application.

remarks.para: This method creates a new target application that is managed by the Secure Store Service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DeleteAllUserCredentials(class Microsoft.Office.SecureStoreService.Server.SecureStoreServiceClaim claim) cil managed

Docs.param: The identity claim of the user whose credentials are being deleted.
Docs.summary: Deletes the credentials for the specified user for all of the target applications.

remarks.para: This method deletes the credentials for the specified user from all of the Secure Store Service target applications.

Docs.summary: Deletes the specified target application.

remarks.para: This method deletes the target application from the Secure Store Service.

Docs.summary: Deletes the current caller credentials for the specified individual target application.

remarks.para: This method must be invoked by an administrator of Secure Store Service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Microsoft.Office.SecureStoreService.Server.SecureStoreServiceClaim> GetApplicationTicketRedeemerClaims(string applicationId) cil managed
Public Function GetApplicationTicketRedeemerClaims (applicationId As String) As IList(Of SecureStoreServiceClaim)

Docs.summary: Gets all of the ticket redeemer claims for the target application.
Docs.returns: A list of the ticket redeemer claims of the specified target application.

remarks.para: This method retrieves the target application ticket redeemer claims. The ticket redeemer claims determine who can call to redeem a ticket for a specified target application.

Docs.param: The ID of the restricted target application.
Docs.summary: Gets the credentials for a restricted target application.
Docs.returns: A credentials collection of the restricted target application.

remarks.para: This method can be called to return the credentials for restricted and non-restricted target applications.

Docs.summary: Gets all of the application definitions for the specified target application for the current caller.
Docs.returns: The application definition for the specified target application.

remarks.para: This method can be called by a Secure Store user who does not have administrative permissions on Secure Store.

Docs.summary: Gets all of the target application definitions for the current caller.
Docs.returns: A list of the target applications.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string IssueTicket() cil managed

Docs.summary: Issues a ticket to the current caller.
Docs.returns: A string that contains the ticket.

remarks.para: Another user can use this ticket to redeem the credentials of the original caller by calling the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.BusinessData.Infrastructure.SecureStore.SecureStoreCredentialCollection RedeemTicket(string applicationId, string base64EncodedTicket) cil managed
Public Function RedeemTicket (applicationId As String, base64EncodedTicket As String) As SecureStoreCredentialCollection

Docs.param: A string that contains the ticket.
Docs.summary: Gets the credentials for the specified ticket and the specified target application.
Docs.returns: The credentials of the target application.

remarks.para: The caller must be a ticket redeemer for the specified target application.

public: void SetUserCredentials(System::String ^ applicationId, Microsoft::Office::SecureStoreService::Server::SecureStoreServiceClaim ^ claim, Microsoft::BusinessData::Infrastructure::SecureStore::SecureStoreCredentialCollection ^ credentials);

Docs.param: The identity claim for the user for whom the credentials are to be set.
Docs.summary: Sets the credentials for a user for the specified individual target application.

remarks.para: This method can be called by the administrators of an application to set the credentials for the specified user.

MemberSignature.Value: public void UpdateApplication (Microsoft.Office.SecureStoreService.Server.TargetApplication application, System.Collections.Generic.IList<Microsoft.Office.SecureStoreService.Server.TargetApplicationField> applicationFields, Microsoft.Office.SecureStoreService.Server.TargetApplicationClaims applicationClaims);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void UpdateApplication(class Microsoft.Office.SecureStoreService.Server.TargetApplication application, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Microsoft.Office.SecureStoreService.Server.TargetApplicationField> applicationFields, class Microsoft.Office.SecureStoreService.Server.TargetApplicationClaims applicationClaims) cil managed
Public Sub UpdateApplication (application As TargetApplication, applicationFields As IList(Of TargetApplicationField), applicationClaims As TargetApplicationClaims)

Docs.summary: Updates a target application definition.

remarks.para: This method updates the target application definition. The target application ID cannot be changed. An individual target application cannot be changed to a group target application and vice versa. In the target application fields, only can be changed in the existing application fields. All other information in the application fields must exactly match the information that was set when the target application was created.
